attributes.comment:
I am a psychologist, feminist and was a strong LGBT Affirmative researcher and therapist before I retired. Mental and psychological health depend on clear definitions of identity. It is vital that the sex of the practitioner I am choosing is clear, not obscured by the need to go overboard to not offend trans people. Women-born-women since birth have been oppressed as females. Everyday life is a torture of female negation and abuse. Just as the race of the doctor means everything, not just in confidence but the doctor's perceptions of the patient's complaints (Take Serena Williams' maternity nightmare as an example)
I want to know who I'm getting as a doctor! Not someone whose identity is blurred by politically correct labels!!!!!
